TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ira_Bowman, title = Ira_Bowman, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ira_Bowman} }

S.FORM: Ira Bowman sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1973, ryax sa tay 11 nqu tay 6, Ira Bowman, squliq na p'unro.
